instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3332A a1398
threads.message:
the device is pulling 0 to 0.89 amps. 0.90 amps continuously repeat after 0 amps
SMC_PM_G2_EN  0 volts then 3.4 then zero constant again
cpu is a little hot
PPVCORE_S0_CPU_PH2 (l7520 ) 0 volts then 1 then zero constant again

Could it be cpu failure?

threads.title: 820-3332A a1398
threads.message:
Did you test in SMC bypass and safe mode?
Be sure to use 85W Magsafe 2 charger and known good battery.
